text:
When trying to create a new user and password, htpasswd generates the following
error:

./htpasswd -c tmp.passwd test
New password:
Re-type new password:
./htpasswd: could not determine temp dir

/tmp dir exists and is writtable to all system users.
creator: ziga.hudolin@gmail.com
jorton@redhat.com
text: What version of APR are you using?  Are you using a packaged version of APR?

creator: jorton@redhat.com
text:
Marking INVALID, lacking feedback.  This is likely to be due to the use of an
old version of apr, which had this bug.
